name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery
display_help: You have advance Mastery over Electricity and are able to control your foes and aid your allies with it.

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery.Chain_Fences
powers.display_help: You can immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor damage to all foes in range and draining some endurance. This power also reduces Flight capacity in targets. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Foe Immobilize, -End, -Fly

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 30 ft. radius (16 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery.Havok_Punch
powers.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with a greater damage. Havoc Punch can may knock down targets, drain some Endurance from your target, or even overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Sleep, -End, Knock back

display_info: 50.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 17.88s on target after 0.25s delay
30.00% chance for 1.6 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay
30.00% chance for 1.6 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery.Paralyzing_Jolt
powers.display_help: You strike an enemy with a powerful jolt of electricity, disorienting him, draining some endurance and causing moderate damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery.Lightning_Field
powers.display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 10 ft. radius (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Electricity_Mastery.Rehabilitating_Circuit
powers.display_help: You can use your Rehabilitating Circuit to heal the wounds of your group. Although you can be healed by this power, you need to use it against an ally for the chain to affect you. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Chain â€” 20 ft. jump distance (255 targets max)
display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack
